

=Event model=




= Event =

The event has the following attributes:
  # *portletTagId* - id of portlet element,
  # *portletUId* - identifier of the portlet, 
  # *name* - event name,
  # *value* (Json String or Object, can be converted from one type to another by kernel of Ajax Portal) - transfer data, 
  # *receiver* (portletTagId or portletUId or null) - point to point or for all.
